République
française

DossierFacile, le dossier de location numérique de l’État

  • Faq
  • En savoir plus
  • Blog

DossierFacile, the smart location file

Drop your file on DossierFacile and increase your probability to find the flat of your dream !

I log in

Make the difference with DossierFacile

Clear, completed and consistent files.

auto_fix_high
An easier file

Because incomplete file rhymes with refused flat, we guide you throw each step to build a perfect location file and compliant to the law.

house
Make the difference

Reassure the owner with the « 3C » standard and increase by 24% your probability to visit the flat of your dream.

mouse
100% online

With DossierFacile everything happens online and in 3 minutes : end of the paperwork. You can send to owners in 1 click by mail or SMS !

verified_user
Your data is protected

We care about protecting your data. They will never be communicated without your express consent. Our watermarking system helps you protect yourself against fraud.

Boost your location file with DossierFacile !

DossierFacile helps you free of charge in the constitution of your rental file to help you put the odds on your side

VISALE

Free and online, Visale is your guarantor to rent your housing !

Get your visa
ANIL

For any question about rent, inquire with ANIL or your ADIL.

Find out more

Boost your file in 3 steps

We help you free of charge to make your rent file

I CREATE AN ACCOUNT IN 3 MINUTES

I create my DossierFacile account in a few minutes by adding only the documents allowed by the law.

I COMPLETE IF NECESSARY

DossierFacile check that your file is Clear, Completed and Consistent to help you put the odds on your side.

I SEND MY LINK TO OWNERS

Once my file is validated, I can send it to any owner by internet or by sms. Thanks to DossierFacile I put the odds on my side to get the flat of my dream
